attributes.action: PLEASE STOP THE PROPOSED BADGER CULL FOR NORTHERN IRELAND 2021
attributes.background: Please stop Edwin Poot's proposed Badger Cull..   Bovine TB has not been proven that Badgers spread it..  Also 8 got of 10 Badgers are healthy - this would be just pure murder of one of our best loved wildlife creatures...  Please Sign. Thank you.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Northern Ireland Assembly is responsible for. 

If you'd like to send your petition to the Northern Ireland Assembly, you can find the contact details here:

http://www.niassembly.gov.uk/about-the-assembly/contact-us/

If you want to raise this issue you could contact your MLA.

You can find contact details for your MLAs here: http://www.niassembly.gov.uk/your-mlas/
